title: Sounds from the Ground - Tribes (2013) [FLAC]
description:
Sounds from the Ground - Tribes (2013) [FLAC]

  Genre: Electronic
  Styles: Downtempo, Ambient, Dub
  Source: CD (log + cue)
  Codec: FLAC
  Bit Rate: ~ 900 kbps
  Bit Depth: 16
  Sampling Rate: 44,100 Hz
  
  01 Infrared
  02 Carousel 
  03 Feels Reel 
  04 One and All 
  05 Craigie Point 
  06 Dimewater 
  07 Tending the Vine 
  08 Nova Stone 
  09 Catching Over Light 
  10 Distant Shores 
  
  Ambient dub-techno duo Sounds From the Ground first came to prominence in 1996 with the epic "Triangle," which was followed by another landmark production, "Gather." After releasing these two successful singles, duo members Elliot Jones and Nick Woolfson crafted their debut long-player, Kin (1996). The well-known West Coast ambient label Waveform released the album in the States to a warm reception.
